backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence descriptor linking a DOM‑update feature to the ValentineEnvelopeScene component.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for key frontend files including main app, components, styles, Tailwind config, and HTML entry.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark OKLCH color system and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file loading root app container and Google Fonts with Valentine-themed metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React layout rendering the envelope scene and a footer with attribution.
frontend/src/components/ValentineEnvelop: Interactive animated envelope and card scene managing transitions between envelope, card, and message states.
frontend/src/components/ValentineMessage: Full‑screen message card with typing animation, confetti, and navigation controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, theme CSS variables, and custom animations with a Valentine's Day color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature tracking information, and the current project state configuration.
